requests.name: Topic Articles
requests.description: Returns a list of articles related to the specified topic.

queryParams.description: Unique API access key
Enables article_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist
Limit items to a predefined list of articles. Value is the name of the predefined article filter list (applicable only when article filtering is enabled via article_filter_mode).
Limit items to the categories specified. Value is a space delimited list of dashed category names.  See Category module for more information.
Beginning of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]
Set to true to include associated topics inline with each article. For faster response times, we recommend setting this to false unless topics are explicitly being used.
The topic guid.
Return only articles that have associated images (accessible via article/GUID/images). Valid values are True or False.
Limit items to those in the specified language. Value is a 2 letter ISO language code.
Search exclusively for fully licensed, full text content. Not available without a contract. Valid values are True or False.
Limit the media type of the returned items. Value is a space delimited list of media types. See Source module for a list of valid media types.
Number of items to skip before beginning the result set. I.e. a pagesize of 10 and offest of 10 will return items 11-20. Used for paginating api queries.
Number of items to return.
Sort order for returned items. Valid values are date and relevance.
List of sources to retrieve items from. Valid sources are specified as a space delimited list of source GUIDs.
Search against only sources from the specified countries. Value is a space delimited list of 2 character ISO 3166-1 country codes.
Enables source_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist
Limit items to a predefined list of sources.Value is the name of the predefined source filter list (applicable only when source filtering is enabled via source_filter_mode).
End of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

requests.name: Articles
requests.description: Returns a list of articles according to the specified set of parameters.

queryParams.description: Unique API access key
Enables article_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist
Limit items to a predefined list of articles. Value is the name of the predefined article filter list (applicable only when article filtering is enabled via article_filter_mode).
Indicates the boolean operation to use on search keywords that do not have explicit whitelist (+) or blacklist (-) operators on them. The value can either be and or or.
Limit items to the categories specified. Value is a space delimited list of dashed category names.  See Category module for more information.
If this parameter is not specified, then stemming is applied, so that for example the query term ship matches articles containing shipping, and vice versa. Specifying exact=true turns stemming off.
Beginning of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]
Set to true to include associated topics inline with each article. For faster response times, we recommend setting this to false unless topics are explicitly being used.
Return only articles that have associated images (accessible via article/GUID/images). Valid values are True or False.
Limit items to those in the specified language. Value is a 2 letter ISO language code.
Search exclusively for fully licensed, full text content. Not available without a contract. Valid values are True or False.
Value is a space delimited list of article links. Articles returned must match one of links provided.
Returns only articles with at most this many words. For example, max_length=200
Limit the media type of the returned items. Value is a space delimited list of media types. See Source module for a list of valid media types.
Returns only articles with at least this many words. For example, min_length=100

Minimum Match: specifies how many of the non whitelist/blacklist keywords must match for an article to be included in the results. Can be an integer (e.g., 1) or a percentage (e.g., 50%). The default value requires that all words match.
Get only articles that have been modified since the supplied date. An articles modified date is the same as its creation date if it hasnt been modified.
Number of items to skip before beginning the result set. I.e. a pagesize of 10 and offest of 10 will return items 11-20. Used for paginating api queries.
Specifies the set of words and phrases to search for.
Specifies which field to search when searching for articles.
Removes articles containing offensive words from search result; when set to true.
Sort order for returned items. Valid values are date and relevance.
List of sources to retrieve items from. Valid sources are specified as a space delimited list of source GUIDs.
Search against only sources from the specified countries. Value is a space delimited list of 2 character ISO 3166-1 country codes.
Enables source_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist
Limit items to a predefined list of sources.Value is the name of the predefined source filter list (applicable only when source filtering is enabled via source_filter_mode).
Value is a space delimited list of topic guids. Articles returned must contain at least one of the topics provided.
Enables topic_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist
Limit items to a predefined list of topics. Value is the name of the predefined topic filter list (applicable only when topic filtering is enabled via topic_filter_mode).
End of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]

Value is a space delimited list of topic guids. Articles returned must contain at least one of the topics provided.

requests.name: Stories
requests.description: Returns the top stories related to the specified query. A story is a group of similar articles. By default, stories are sorted by a combination of recency and importance. If the from_date and/or to_date parameters are specified, stories are sorted by importance only.

queryParams.description: Unique API access key
Enables article_filter_name and indicates filtering type. Allowed values are whitelist or blacklist
Limit items to a predefined list of articles. Value is the name of the predefined article filter list (applicable only when article filtering is enabled via article_filter_mode).

Limit items to the categories specified. Value is a space delimited list of dashed category names.  See Category module for more information.

If this parameter is not specified, then stemming is applied, so that for example the query term ship matches articles containing shipping, and vice versa. Specifying exact=true turns stemming off.
Beginning of date range for which items are searched. Format: yyyy-mm-dd [hh:mm:ss]
Set to true to include associated topics inline with each article. For faster response times, we recommend setting this to false unless topics are explicitly being used.
Return only articles that have associated images (accessible via article/GUID/images). Valid values are True or False.

Search exclusively for fully licensed, full text content. Not available without a contract. Valid values are True or False.
Value is a space delimited list of article links. Articles returned must match one of links provided.

Returns only articles with at least this many words. For example, min_length=100

Minimum Match: specifies how many of the non whitelist/blacklist keywords must match for an article to be included in the results. Can be an integer (e.g., 1) or a percentage (e.g., 50%). The default value requires that all words match.
Get only articles that have been modified since the supplied date. An articles modified date is the same as its creation date if it hasnt been modified.
